lead_paragraph: Once a limited-overs giant, Yuvraj Singh has been in and out of the Indian team in recent years but the all-rounder believes he still has enough cricket in him to look forward to the 2019 World Cup in England and Wales.

headline.print_headline: Determined Yuvraj Sets 2019 World Cup Goal
headline.main: Determined Yuvraj Sets 2019 World Cup Goal

snippet: Once a limited-overs giant, Yuvraj Singh has been in and out of the Indian team in recent years but the all-rounder believes he still has enough cricket in him to look forward to the 2019 World Cup in England and Wales....
